name: Bulbasaur
dex_entry: A seed on its back grows by soaking up sunlight.
spawn_rate: Appears in Wild Zone 20 (post-game) — textual rarity: common in specific subzones; Game8 lists it as a Wild Zone 20 spawn. May also appear as Alpha variants. (See sources)

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 20 (Prism Tower) — grassy/dirt subzones
A Call from Mable (side mission reward)

name: Ivysaur
dex_entry: An evolved form of Bulbasaur; does not generally spawn in the wild (evolution-exclusive in many sources).
spawn_rate: No regular wild spawns listed — typically obtained by evolving Bulbasaur.

name: Venusaur
dex_entry: Final evolution of Bulbasaur; typically obtained via evolution rather than wild spawn.
spawn_rate: No regular wild spawns listed — evolution-exclusive in Game8 / guides.

name: Charmander
dex_entry: A Fire-type starter; appears in Wild Zone 20 and is also obtainable via the Mable side quest choice.
spawn_rate: Appears in Wild Zone 20 (post-game) — textual rarity per Game8; oft recommended Shiny hunting location is Wild Zone 20.

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 20 (dirt patches/subzones)
A Call from Mable (side mission reward)

name: Charmeleon
dex_entry: Middle evolution of Charmander; generally obtained by evolving Charmander rather than wild-spawning.
spawn_rate: No regular wild spawns listed — evolution-exclusive in many guides.

name: Charizard
dex_entry: Final evolution of Charmander; may appear in certain zones as high-level or Alpha variants in post-game Wild Zones per guides.
spawn_rate: Rare / very rare in wild; primarily evolution-exclusive unless listed on specific Wild Zone pages.

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 20 (select spawns/Alpha)

name: Squirtle
dex_entry: A Water-type starter; appears in Wild Zone 20 and obtainable via Mable side quest choice.
spawn_rate: Appears in Wild Zone 20 (post-game) — textual rarity per Game8.

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 20 (near rivers/streams)
A Call from Mable (side mission reward)

name: Wartortle
dex_entry: Middle evolution of Squirtle; typically obtained by evolving Squirtle.
spawn_rate: No regular wild spawns listed — evolution-exclusive in many guides.

name: Blastoise
dex_entry: Final evolution of Squirtle; rare as a wild spawn, generally evolution-exclusive.
spawn_rate: Rare / evolution-obtained unless explicitly listed in a Wild Zone page.

name: Caterpie
dex_entry: Common Bug-type; spawns in early zones and parks.
spawn_rate: Common in early Wild Zones and park areas (textual).

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 1 / Greenway Plaza / Lumiose Park (early zones)

name: Metapod
dex_entry: A cocoon Pokémon; evolves from Caterpie.
spawn_rate: Usually evolution-obtained (from Caterpie). Occasional Wild Zone listings as metamorphosed spawns.

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 1 (early zones/parks)
spawn_locations.chance: textual (appears via raising Caterpie or rare wild in early zones)

name: Butterfree
dex_entry: Butterfree is commonly found after evolving Metapod; occasional wild spawns in garden/park Wild Zones.
spawn_rate: Textual: common in early Wild Zones and park areas (see sources).

spawn_locations.name: Greenway Plaza / Lumiose Gardens / Wild Zone 1

name: Weedle
dex_entry: A small bug that prefers grass and forested areas.
spawn_rate: Listed as present in Wild Zone 1 (textual common); also noted as a good Shiny hunt spot in Magenta Sector 9 (Game8).

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 1 (grass/forest sections)
Magenta Sector 9 (Shiny hunting hotspot)

name: Kakuna
dex_entry: A cocoon Pokémon often found hanging from trees in certain Wild Zones.
spawn_rate: Appears in Wild Zone 2 & other early mid zones (textual); may have Alpha fixed spawn in Magenta Sector 9 per Game8.

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 2 (trees / raised areas)
Magenta Sector 9 (Alpha / shiny hunting areas)

name: Beedrill
dex_entry: Final evolution of Weedle; sometimes found in early Wild Zones or obtained via evolution.
spawn_rate: Typically evolution-obtained; some Wild Zone listings (textual rare/common depending on zone).

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 1 / Park Boulevard

name: Pidgey
dex_entry: Common small bird found in many rooftop and plaza areas.
spawn_rate: Common in Rooftop Garden and several early Wild Zones (textual).

spawn_locations.name: Rooftop Garden / Wild Zone 5 / Wild Zone 1

name: Pidgeotto
dex_entry: Evolves from Pidgey; tends to be less common as a wild spawn.
spawn_rate: Uncommon; generally evolution-obtained.

spawn_locations.name: Observatory / Rooftop Garden

name: Pidgeot
dex_entry: Final evolution of Pidgey; rare as a wild spawn.
spawn_rate: Rare (evolution-obtained or special spawns)

spawn_locations.name: Prism Tower (rare spawns)

name: Rattata
dex_entry: Common rodent often found in alleyways and night areas.
spawn_rate: Common (Lumiose Alleyways & night spawns)

spawn_locations.name: Lumiose Alleyways / Central Plaza (night)

name: Raticate
dex_entry: Evolved form of Rattata; less common in the wild.
spawn_rate: Uncommon; usually evolution-obtained.

spawn_locations.name: Central Plaza / Residential Avenue

name: Spearow
dex_entry: A small, aggressive bird Pokémon often found in open areas.
spawn_rate: Common in early Wild Zones and rooftop areas (textual).

spawn_locations.name: Boulevard / Rooftop Garden / Wild Zone 1

name: Fearow
dex_entry: The evolved form of Spearow; larger and more powerful.
spawn_rate: Uncommon; mainly evolution-obtained or rare wild spawns.

spawn_locations.name: Observatory / Rooftop Garden (rare)

name: Ekans
dex_entry: A snake Pokémon that hides under foliage at night.
spawn_rate: Listed on Game8 as present in Wild Zone 4 (textual).

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 4 (graveyard/trees)
Lysandre Labs (special area)

name: Arbok
dex_entry: The evolved form of Ekans; rarely appears in the wild.
spawn_rate: Uncommon; generally evolution-obtained.

spawn_locations.name: Canal Dock / Wild Zone 4 (rare)

name: Pikachu
dex_entry: An Electric-type famed for storing electricity in its cheeks.
spawn_rate: Appears in multiple Wild Zones (Game8 lists Alpha Pikachu in Wild Zone 6; other guides note Wild Zone 3 spawns).

spawn_locations.name: Wild Zone 6 (Alpha on roof of Cafe Bataille)
Wild Zone 3 (various subzones)

name: Raichu
dex_entry: An evolved form of Pikachu; less commonly found in the wild.
spawn_rate: Uncommon; typically evolution-obtained unless listed on specific Wild Zone pages.

spawn_locations.name: Residential Avenue / Wild Zone 6 (rare)

name: Sandshrew
dex_entry: A small burrowing Pokémon often found in sandy areas and construction sites.
spawn_rate: Uncommon; found in underpasses and outskirts (textual).

spawn_locations.name: Boulevard Underpass / Lumiose Outskirts

name: Sandslash
dex_entry: The evolved form of Sandshrew; more powerful and rare.
spawn_rate: Rare; mostly evolution-obtained.

spawn_locations.name: Lumiose Outskirts / Wild Zone 7 (rare)

name: Nidoran♀
dex_entry: A small poisonous Pokémon often found in grassy areas.
spawn_rate: Common in Greenway Plaza and early Wild Zones (textual).

spawn_locations.name: Greenway Plaza / Wild Zone 2

name: Nidorina
dex_entry: Evolves from Nidoran♀; less common in wild spawns.
spawn_rate: Uncommon; evolution-obtained mostly.

spawn_locations.name: Lumiose Gardens / Wild Zone 3 (rare)

name: Dugtrio
dex_entry: Lives underground; three heads coordinate digging.

spawn_locations.name: Prism Tower / Roof District / Wild Zone 6
